name: S-(hercyn-2-yl)-L-cysteine-S-oxide ergothioneine-lyase (deaminating; pyruvate-forming)
definition: S-(Hercyn-2-yl)-L-cysteine S-oxide + Reduced acceptor <=> Ergothioneine + Pyruvate + Ammonia + Acceptor
